cast.overview: A depressed musician reunites with his lover. However, their romance, already played over several centuries, is disrupted by the arrival of her uncontrollable younger sister.
cast.title: Only Lovers Left Alive

details.biography: Cody Stauber is an actor, writer and director from Lake Orion, MI. He earned his bachelor's degree in Broadcast and Cinematic Arts from Central Michigan University and is a Producer for the Detroit production company Hazel House Films, with cinematographer Steve Foran. Cody is recognized by his exceptional height (6'7") and long hair.
details.name: Cody Stauber
